name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 - Part III: NightFall
name_original: Welcome To... Chichester 2 - Part III: NightFall
description:
This visual novel is the last in the Welcome To... Chichester 2 trilogy, and the penultimate episode. Playing the previous episode would be beneficial.

The Story

For a short while after the events of No Regrets For The Future, life returned to normality for the protagonist and Grendel Jinx. However, with William returning from the Happy Glowstick Funtime Re-education Camp, life gradually becomes more complicated for Grendel as she has to cope with final school exams, her parents divorcing and an unwanted new stepsister.

The protagonist is naturally drawn into these affairs as he/she has to contend with an assassination attempt by Grendel's father, being abducted by Grendel's mother, an increasingly hostile (to The Council Of The Unseen) secretary and a debauched boss, culminating in the protagonist being forced to destroy The Council Of The Unseen, by using their own weapons against them.

Spanning five years from the end of No Regrets to the start of The Spy Of America And The Long Vacation, this episode concludes the main prequel arc - with a bang

Features :

  • 11 bad endings and one true ending
  • Multiple routes
  • 100,000+ word story, with an estimated play time of 6 - 8 hours. Complete the game, and subsequent playthroughs will extend the story by around 1 to 2 hours, with extra detail for certain events.
  • Option to display current route (and choice)
  • Visual impairment modes as well (font change, font size and so on)
